name: Immortal Heroes
description: You are a brave warrior who came to this world to save its inhabitants. Here you will be met by awful monsters, such as huge spiders, wolf-werewolves, bears, unicorns ... The essence of the game, like any clicker, is to quickly press the button to the finish.
minimum_requirements: OS: xp, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: 1.2 GHz Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7 8 8.1 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Graphics: Better then Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
